full_summary:
====================
**Tender Notice for Digital Signage Connectivity, Portal Access, Technical Support, and Maintenance (InfoTV)**

**Solicitation Number**: 202400109

**Contracting Authority**: Public Safety Canada

**Description of Requirement**: Public Safety Canada is seeking proposals for the provision of digital signage connectivity, portal access, technical support, and maintenance services (InfoTV) for a period of one (1) year.

**Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology**: The evaluation process will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%).

**Closing Date**: The proposal will close on **June 7, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET**.

**Attachments**: 

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Amendment 5
* Questions and Answers (Q&A)
* French and English versions of the RFP, Amendment 1, Amendment 2, Amendment 3, and Q&A

**Note**: The notice is now expired. Please see the Canada Buys website at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) for information on current tender opportunities.

**Background Information**: Public Safety Canada is the sole party responsible for the acquisition of these services. All related inquiries should be directed to the Contracting Authority, Alexandra Gallerio, at (873) 455-3604 or via email at alexandra.gallerio@ps-sp.gc.ca.

Key dates and milestones include:

* **Publication Date**: April 3, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Exired
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada, Ontario (except NCR), National Capital Region (NCR), British Columbia, Manitoba, Nova Scotia, and Quebec (except NCR)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
